title: Homeopathic medicines for rotavirus infection - homeopathy
cleaned_text:
Rotavirus is a highly contagious viral infection leading to diarrhea. Rotavirus is one amongst the major causes of diarrhea in infants and children. Among the eight species of rotavirus from A to H, rotavirus A is the most common cause of rotavirus infection in humans. The infection spreads through the fecal-oral route. The infection spreads by contact with the infected stool. Homeopathic medicines for rotavirus, which are derived from natural plant sources, strengthen the immune system to fight back the infection and aid full recovery.

Rotavirus infection leads to severe gastroenteritis. The symptoms of rotavirus infection are fever, vomiting, and diarrhea. It may be attended by abdominal pain. Severe dehydration may follow the rotavirus infection.

Homeopathy has the potential to treat rotavirus infection by following a symptomatic approach. Homeopathy follows a very safe and gentle approach to treat rotavirus infection. The most appropriate Homeopathic medicines for rotavirus infection are Arsenic Album, Podophyllum, China and Veratrum Album.

1. Arsenic Album – One of the Most Effective Medicines for Rotavirus Infection

Arsenic Album is one of the most reliable medicines for rotavirus infection. The symptoms for prescription of Arsenic Album are copious diarrhea and vomiting. Diarrhea and vomiting appear after eating and drinking. The stomach can’t seem to hold even a little food or water. Any food or water consumed is soon ejected. Thirst for water in small quantities may be present. Fever may be an attending symptom in such cases where Arsenic Album will prove the most effective among medicines for rotavirus infection.

Podophyllum is another one of the highly recommended medicines for rotavirus infection. Its use is suggested when the stools are gushing, copious and watery. The stool is also highly offensive. The stool may be greenish in colour. It may contain undigested food particles, yellow sediments.

Homeopathic medicine China is rated best among medicines for rotavirus infection where diarrhea is attended with extreme exhaustion. The diarrhea is also accompanied by excessive flatulence. The child feels exhausted, weak and even drowsy at times. Fainting spells are also common. China comes recommended as the most appropriate among medicines for rotavirus infection with the above symptoms.

Veratrum Album is the indicated prescription among natural medicines for rotavirus infection where dehydration is a key symptom. The stool is watery and evacuated forcibly. Abdomen pain may precede the stool. This is attended with copious vomiting. Dehydration arises from excessive fluid loss. The body gets cold and breaks into a sweat. Low blood pressure and cold breath may result.
